messages.subject: Re: Kondou and Saitou grave pics posted in "Locations" (in "Photos") in SHQ
messages.msgSnippet: WOW I like S.H. s grave pic in color finally...in the book Saitou Hajime no subete there is a pic of his grave w/ flowers and what seems to be [2] bottles of
messages.messageBody:
WOW I like S.H.'s grave pic in color finally...in the book Saitou
Hajime no subete there is a pic of his grave w/ flowers and what
seems to be [2] bottles of alcohol???

***maybe somebody offered him that new Shinsengumi beer...in the
netherworld I imagine the soul of S.H. going "what's this?"..."hey,
Toshi, do you know they are putting your face on beer bottles?"

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Hirotada Tokugawa" <patriot014@h...>
wrote:
